```{r}
require(XML)
require(plyr)
```

```{r list-all-xml-files}
all_files_xml <- list.files("./witsml", recursive = TRUE, full.names = TRUE, 
                        include.dirs = TRUE, pattern = "*.xml")

# get the file for trajectory
traj_files <- grep(pattern = "trajectory", ignore.case = TRUE, 
                   value = TRUE, x = all_files_xml)
traj_files
```

Source: http://rpubs.com/jsmanij/131030

```{r}
fileurl <- traj_files[3]
doc <- xmlParse(fileurl,useInternalNodes = TRUE) ### xmlParse()- is to parse the xml content, the parsed content is stored into doc
doc
```
```{r}
xL <- xmlToList(doc) ###is to convert xml doc into List

data <- ldply(xL, data.frame)
head(data)
```

```{r}
names(data)
```
